column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jessica - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you had to wait so long during your first visit to JINYA. Unfortunately
column2: we do experience extended wait times during peak hours
column3: especially on Friday and Saturday nights. And in hindsight
column4: had we known the impact authentic Japanese ramen would have on the Houston market
column5: we probably would have sought a much larger space. But there's an old saying in the food-service industry: "There's no such thing as a perfect restaurant." So we try to do our best with what we have.
